text: Green Goblin is the alias of several fictional supervillains appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The most well-known incarnations of the character are Norman Osborn and Harry Osborn. The Green Goblin is a Halloween-themed supervillain whose weapons resemble bats, ghosts, and jack-o'-lanterns and in most incarnations uses a hoverboard or glider to fly. They are enemies of Spider-Man. == In other media == The character has adapted to different forms of media, including toys, movies, television series, and video games. He was played by Willem Dafoe and James Franco in Sam Raimi's Spider-Man trilogy (2002-2007), and Dafoe reprised his role in Spider- Man: No Way Home (2021). The character is also played by Chris Cooper and Dane DeHaan in The Amazing Spider-Man 2. title: Green Goblin
